original: Brodin, Gustaf Emil, komminister, Eksjö, f. 12/7/0i6 i Västra Ryd, Öster-götl. 1., av lantbr. Axel B. o. Juha Johansson. G. 35 m. Elisabeth Vidlund. Barn: Christina f. 41, Ingrid 43. — Stud:ex. i Upps. 28, teol. fil ex. 30, teol. kand. 34, prakt. teol. prov samt prästvigd f. Linköpings stift 34. V. pastor i Trehörna 35, i Stora Aby 36, i Hallingeberg 37, kommin. i Eksjö sed. 42, militärpastor v. Jönköp.-Kalmar reg. sed. s. å.
translated: Brodin, Gustaf Emil, vicar, Eksjö, born on July 12, 1906 in Västra Ryd, Östergötland, son of farmer Axel B. and Juha Johansson. Married in 1935 to Elisabeth Vidlund, with two children: Christina (born in 1941) and Ingrid (born in 1943). Completed undergraduate studies in Uppsala in 1928, theological studies in 1930, and earned a theological degree in 1934. Successfully completed his practical theological exam and was ordained in Linköping diocese in 1934. Served as an associate pastor in Trehörna in 1935, Stora Aby in 1936, and Hallingeberg in 1937 before becoming a vicar in Eksjö in 1942. He also served as a military pastor of the Jönköping-Kalmar regiment starting that same year.
